name: Rakshita
greetingText: You are the spark that lights up my world!
wishText: May our love continue to grow exponentially, my Angel.
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yay! Sending you all my love...
text2: I was going to send you a simple message.
text5Content: You are my one and only Noodles ‚ù§Ô∏è
outroText: Can't wait to make more memories with you. Did you like this surprise?
replayText: Click here if you want to experience it again.
